document.full_text: three chechen men were convicted in austria on wednesday of their role in an exile's murder during a botched kidnapping that authorities suspect chechen president ramzan kadyrov ordered.
document.title: vienna court convicts three in chechen exile murder
lines_and_colors: three chechen men were convicted in austria on wednesday of their role in an exile's murder during a botched kidnapping that authorities suspect chechen president ramzan kadyrov ordered.
